Package Q3

Class AVLTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Q3.BinaryTree<E>
      • Q3.BinarySearchTree<E>
        • Q3.BinarySearchTreeWithRotate<E>
          • Q3.AVLTree<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, SearchTree<E>
    public class AVLTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends BinarySearchTreeWithRotate<E>
    Self-balancing binary search tree using the algorithm defined by Adelson-Velskii and Landis.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • AVLTree

        public AVLTree​(BinarySearchTree bst)
        Constructor that takes a binary search tree. Checks if the given BST is an AVL tree or not. Throws and exception if the parameter is not an AVL tree.
        Parameters:
